4311200.name: Trainz Plus DLC - Pro Train: SW1500 Loco Pack 4
4311200.description:
The EMD SW1500 is a 1,500 hp (1,119 kW) diesel-electric switcher locomotive built by General Motors’ Electro-Motive Division between 1966 and 1974. Designed to replace the SW1200, it quickly became a favorite across North America not only for yard switching, but also for road freight service thanks to its reliability and versatility.

This DLC brings the legendary SW1500 to life with five highly detailed variants, each authentically recreated with realistic physics, sounds, and visual fidelity.

Included Liveries:

  • TP&W SW1500 Red

  • CN SW1500

  • UP SW1500

  • CP SW1500

  • MRL 2 SW1500

Key Features:

  • Fully animated driver’s cabin with interactive controls

  • Animated wipers and functional cab details

  • Support for ACS coupling

  • Authentic running numbers

  • Animated cooling fans that react dynamically to engine load

  • Custom headlights and ditchlights

  • Realistic weathering skins for locomotive and bogies

  • Dynamic fuel consumption system

  • Immersive radio chatter for extra atmosphere

Whether you’re shunting cars in a busy yard or hauling short freights on the mainline, the SW1500 offers an engaging and authentic switching experience.

Please refer Trainz Wiki for detailed information about the advances features. Search for 'Pro Train'.
4311200.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 俄语
